title: Forever 27
description: Six teenagers living in foster care make a deal with the Devil. On their 27th birthdays, Satan comes to collect.  Jim Morrison, Kurt Cobain, Jimi Hendrix, and Janis Joplin. The list goes on. What do all these famous names have in common? They all perished at the ripe age of 27. No one knew where the rumors began, but whispers of a supernatural force being blamed for their untimely deaths have been circulating over the years. Some say that each made a deal with the Devil. Each made it as far as they could before he came backâ€¦
author: Greg     Hall
